name: The Whole Spectrum Hoodie
description:
A spectrum of words for a spectrum of people.

Love. Understand. Educate.

Think about The Whole Spectrum.

- 50% cotton/50% polyester fleece 
- Double-lined hood with matching drawstring at neck 
- 1 x 1 athletic rib knit cuffs and collar with Lycra® 
- Quarter-turned to eliminate center crease

name: Puzzle Piece Design- Hoodie
description:
The Spectrum Designs original now available in a hoodie. 

Stay comfortable and represent. 

- 50% cotton/50% polyester fleece
- Double-lined hood with matching drawstring at neck
- 1 x 1 athletic rib knit cuffs and collar with Lycra®
- Quarter-turned to eliminate center crease

name: 'The Whole Spectrum' Blanket
description:
A spectrum of words for a spectrum of people. 

Love. Understand. Educate.  

Think about The Whole Spectrum.


DryBlend® Performance Fleece Stadium Blanket  
- 50% cotton, 50% polyester sweatshirt fleece
- double-needle hem
- 9.3 oz. 50"W x 60"H

name: Sarah Breese for Spectrum
description: Design from Sarah Breese Illustration exclusively for Spectrum Designs Foundation.

name: Official Spectrum Designs Mini Cooler
description:
Represent Spectrum Designs where ever you wonder.

Keeps hot things hot and cold things cold. 

"Exceptional Products, Exceptional People."

Translucent colored six pack insulated cooler.

-Front pocket.
-Holds 6-pack of your favorite beverage.
-Made of PVC.

name: Spectrum Humanity Tee
description:
A T-shirt dedicated to acknowledging the important contribution Dr Temple Grandin has made to Animal Welfare and Autism advocacy and awareness. 

With the great support of Dr Temple Grandin and Mark Deesing, each T-Shirt made will provide gainful employment to individuals with developmental disabilities, while dually recognizing the significance of humane animal handling and the capabilities of those with autism.  

Furthermore, $5 of each and every t-shirt sold will go directly to The Temple Grandin-Eustacia Cutler Autism Fund. An important new charitable organization that supports the needs of all family members of those affected by autism. 
www.templegrandineustaciacutlerautismfund.com

“When I was younger I was looking for this magic meaning of life. It’s very simple now. Making the lives of others better, doing something of lasting value. That’s the meaning of life, it’s that simple.” 
~Temple Grandin

name: Spectrum Designs' "VERY OWN" Tee Black
description:
When you wear this shirt proudly, you are helping us let everyone know of the AWESOME work we are doing here at SPECTRUM.

SPECTRUM DESIGNS: MERCHANDISE with IMPACT!

-100% certified combed ringspun cotton
-3/4" seamed collarette
-Double-needle stitching on sleeves and bottom hem
- Shoulder-to-shoulder tape

name: Puzzle Piece Design- A Spectrum of Colors
description:
The Spectrum Designs original now available in a unique 'spectrum of colors'. 

(Pictured Medium)

100% combed ringspun cotton- 
- 3/4" seamed collarette
- Double-needle stitching on sleeves and bottom hem
- Shoulder-to-shoulder tape

Click image 2 for size chart.

name: Youth Puzzle Piece Design- A Spectrum of Colors!
description:
A modification of the hugely popular Puzzle Piece Spectrum design. Made especially with all the Autism Awareness kids in mind!

Unisex and with a choice of bright summer colors available! 

100% Pre-shrunk durable heavy cotton (made with kids in mind!)
Double needle stitching throughout (as above!)
Seamless rib at neck
Taped shoulder to shoulder

(Orange & Blue Pictured Large, Pink Medium)

BODY WIDTH  
XS  14  
S  16  
M  17  
L  18  
XL  20  

FULL BODY LENGTH  
XS  18  
S  20  
M  22  
L  24  
XL  26

name: Puzzle Piece Design- LONG SLEEVE Dark Grey
description:
WOW! Our Puzzle Piece Spectrum Design, features our own spin on the famous Pink Floyd Album cover.
Very cool for all ages! Perfect for spreading Awareness about Autism in a fashionable way! 

-100% combed ringspun cotton jersey
-Made with custom superior quality jersey
- Ribbed cuffs
- Comfortable for cooler weather days

options.name: Grey Long Sleeve- Xtra Large - 31L x 24W

name: MOM + AUTISM = SUPERMOM!Customizable! BLACK VNECK!
description:
Just in time for mothers day which is 
May 8, 2011!

For the SUPER Woman in your life! Show the mom of your kids, your sister, aunt, god mother, teacher or heck just get one for YOURSELF!

Being a WOMAN touched by autism, automatically inducts you into the world of SUPERHERODOM! Look out Wonderwoman!

Featured on our 100% combed ringspun cotton balck v neck; basic style reinvented with a comfortable set-in V-neck; super soft baby jersey knit; contoured sideseams flatter the figure; set-in sleeves

name: Super Dad!
description:
June 19th is dedicated to those extra special fathers that go above and beyond the call of duty for their extra special children. 

Quite frankly, they are extraordinary. Just like this shirt, just like you for buying it. We promise this gift will be as unique as the man you know as 'Dad'. 


100% Ringspun Cotton T-Shirts! SUPER SOFT!
- 3/4" seamed collarette
- Double-needle stitching on sleeves and bottom hem
- Shoulder-to-shoulder tape
- Sewn with cotton thread

SEE SIZE CHART BELOW:
XS 27.5L x 17W
S 28L x 18W
M 29L x 20W
L 30L x 22W
XL 31L x 24W
2XL 32L x 26W
3XL 33L x 28W

name: Puzzle Piece Design- Cami Tank
description:
The Spectrum Designs original now available in the extremely popular Cami Tank!


6.5 ounce 95% cotton 5% spandex 
1/4" self-adjusting back bra satin trim straps 
Built in contoured shelf lining for support

(Pictured Medium)

name: Zany Tee
description:
Hannah Leigh is a teenage girl with Autism that loves fashion. The A-Z series was created by her; characterizing her zany curly hair coupled with her love of the alphabet and her favorite color green. 

Hannah always dreamed of becoming a fashion designer and a portion of sales from this t-shirt will help employ adults with autism. 

Shirts made by individuals with autism at Spectrum Designs. Exceptional Products made by Exceptional People (www.spectrumdesigns.org)  

American Apparel; the softest, smoothest, best-looking T-shirt available anywhere.
100% Fine Jersey cotton construction 
Durable rib neckband
Fabric weight 4.3 oz/yd² (146 g/m²)

name: Puzzle Piece Tote Bag
description:
Support and represent Spectrum Designs while doing your part in protecting the enviroment with this trendy tote bag! Double the altruism! 

The bags are 10oz. cotton canvas, with a gusset bottom and contrasting 22" polypropylene navy handles. 

Perfect for all your heavy item carrying needs!

name: Official Spectrum Designs Baseball Cap
description:
Represent Spectrum Designs where ever you wonder.

Cotton Twill with adjustable sizing strap. 

"Exceptional Products, Exceptional People."

name: Life's a Beach Towel!
description:
Show your support for Autism Awareness and your love for all things Spectrum Designs with this beautiful custom made beach towel. 

100% Super Soft cotton sheared woven terry
Large Beach towel measuring 35" x 62"

*Personalize your towel for just $3 extra!* 
It's simple: when CHECKING OUT, IN THE "NOTE TO SELLER SECTION": Note the NAME that you want to appear either underneath the puzzle piece or along the bottom of the towel! (this note section is under your shipping address before you confirm your order)

name: NCFA Tote
description:
The official tote bag of the Nicholas Center For Autism. 

Two side printed tote. 
Side 1: Artist drawn image of 'the new building' by Ines Benecchi (mother of Buzz)
Side 2: NCFA Logo 'Creating Opportunities Exceeding Expectations'

Specs:
-10oz. cotton canvas
- Gusset bottom 
- Contrasting 22" polypropylene navy handles.

Perfect for all your heavy item carrying needs!

name: Official NOK Rockers Tee
description:
Allow us to introduce Saranna, James, and Isaiah, the founding members of the NOK Rockers and the faces of the Nourish Our Kids™ movement!

Creatively tackling the growing childhood obesity crisis affecting young children, Nourish Our Kids™ uses its healthy peer-role model characters, The NOK Rockers, in their storybooks, music, games, and early intervention school curriculum. Learn more at www.nourishourkids.com or read about the characters behind the shirts here: http://nourishourkids.com/kids-zone/the-book/

In heartfelt support of Spectrum Designs, Nourish Our Kids, Inc™ has pledged to make Spectrum the exclusive vendor of all NOK Rockers apparel with all proceeds going to supporting the gainful employment of individuals with developmental disabilities! Go ahead, wear your shirt with a healthy sense of pride.

name: Official NOK Rockers Tee (Youth)
description:
Allow us to introduce Saranna, James, and Isaiah, the founding members of the NOK Rockers and the faces of the Nourish Our Kids™ movement! 
 
Creatively tackling the growing childhood obesity crisis affecting young children, Nourish Our Kids™ uses its healthy peer-role model characters, The NOK Rockers, in their storybooks, music, games, and early intervention school curriculum. Learn more at www.nourishourkids.com or read about the characters behind the shirts here: http://nourishourkids.com/kids-zone/the-book/ 

In heartfelt support of Spectrum Designs, Nourish Our Kids, Inc™ has pledged to make Spectrum the exclusive vendor of all NOK Rockers apparel with all proceeds going to supporting the gainful employment of individuals with developmental disabilities! Go ahead, wear your shirt with a healthy sense of pride.

name: Saint Patrick's Spectrum 2012 Tee (Youth)
description:
Irish for the day or Irish year round, March 17th gives millions around the world a very good excuse to kick up their heals and paint the town green! 

All we ask at Spectrum is that you do so wearing one of our 2012 St. Pat's tees. Each leaf on the 'Spectrum Shamrock' contains words inspired by those we have made it our mission to champion. Though they're doing a pretty good job of it themselves, (see shirt to the left!)

As always, inspired, designed, and produced by individuals with developmental disabilities. 

Sláinte! (Cheers!)

Join Us at our Annual St. Patricks Day Gathering! This year we will be at 
Sutton Place
124 W. Park Ave
Long Beach NY

Saturday March 17, 2012
6pm-9pm
Admission Free! There will be music and Traditional Irish yummies to enjoy! All we ask is you please support our cause and GET YOR SHIRTS HERE! $15 Pre Sale, $20 at the event!
http://www.facebook.com/events/161287257314945/

name: The One Spectrum™ Hoodie (Youth)
description:
Buy One, Give One.
 
A gift made by those with special needs to benefit those in need. 
The gift is dignity. The gift is pride. The gift is hope. 
It’s that simple. Yet so much more.
 
Learn just how much more at www.1spectrum.org
 
8 oz. Extremely soft Cotton/poly 
-Neck twill tape 
-No draw cord for child safety
-Double needle stitching. 

(Pictured Small)

name: The One Spectrum™ Hoodie
description:
Buy One, Give One.

A gift made by those with special needs to benefit those in need. 
The gift is dignity. The gift is pride. The gift is hope.
It’s that simple. Yet so much more. 

Learn just how much more at www.1spectrum.org

-10 oz. Extremely soft cotton/poly, 
-Contrast jersey hood lining and draw cord. 
-Matching neck twill tape contrast coverstitich details.  
-Fabric is pre-shrunk and pre-washed for soft hand feel. 
(Pictured Large)

name: The Whole Spectrum Hoodie- Light Pink
description:
A spectrum of words for a spectrum of people.

Love. Understand. Educate.

Think about The Whole Spectrum.

- 50% cotton/50% polyester fleece 
- Double-lined hood with matching drawstring at neck 
- 1 x 1 athletic rib knit cuffs and collar with Lycra® 
- Quarter-turned to eliminate center crease

name: 'Embracing Autism' Tee
description:
When asked to convey their motivation, passion and desire to work with the special needs population, a group of special educators came up with this tee. 

"Finally I have the tattoo I always wanted on a t-shirt!" one remarked.

Embrace the different. 

- 100% combed ringspun cotton 
- 3/4" seamed collarette 
- Double-needle stitching on sleeves and bottom hem 
- Shoulder-to-shoulder tape

Click image 2 for size chart.

name: Band-Aid For Autism Tee
description:
Benefitting individuals with Autism, saluting the professionals that Rock.. 

- 100% combed ringspun cotton 
- 3/4" seamed collarette 
- Double-needle stitching on sleeves and bottom hem

name: PEACE LOVE ABA - Fashion Fit Black V Neck
description:
'The Sixties' may conjure up a number of images, sounds, feelings, even memories for some (even if they are a little 'hazy').
 
We're aware that 'ABA' probably doesn't fit in with the whole 'Peace love' thing, but isn't that what defined the era? Not fitting in was cool then, and still is, isn't it? Unless of course you're some sort of nark.. 

Specs:
100% preshrunk heavyweight cotton; 1/2" rib V-neck collar; double-needle stitching on sleeves and bottom hem; fashion cut, relaxed silhouette; Heather Grey is 90% cotton, 10% polyester

Sizes: 
Small 18Wx26L
Medium 20Wx27L
Large 22Wx28L
XL 24Wx29L

name: Love is Overrated
description:
Ava Michele for Spectrum Designs

"Love is Overrated"...that's right... we said it...

Featured on our Big League Burnout Baseball Tee

This is a unisex regular fit burnout ¾-sleeve baseball tee. burnout fabric is put through an extensive process to reveal years of authentic weathering and a cozy vintage worn-in feel, so no two shirts are exactly the same.

• 30’s burnout: 50% cotton, 50% polyester
• fabric dyed and washed for a super soft hand
• sleeves union dyed; may slightly tint garment body
• wash in cold water, tumble dry medium

How it fits:
XS Bust 30-32 Waist 24-26 Hips 34-36
S Bust 32-34 Waist 26-28 Hips 36-38
M Bust 34-36 Waist 28-30 Hips 38-40
L Bust 36-38 Waist 30-32 Hips 40-42
XL Bust 39-40 Waist 32-34 Hips 42-44

About our Artist
Ava Michele is the current artist at Spectrum Designs Foundation Ava is 25 years old, and resides in her hometown of Atlantic Beach New York. She studied art history at Hofstra University, and is inspired by artists such as Lichtenstein, Mondrian , Milton Glaser and Shepard Fairey. In addition to designing for Spectrum Designs, Ava is launching her very own t-shirt line!!! The line is called FEARLESS , and items can purchased in the online store (coming soon!) Ava was introduced to Spectrum team through her brother David, who attends Camp Huntington and fits into the autism spectrum. Autism is something that has played a major role in her life since a young age. To be able to design for a purpose, and make a difference through design, especially one so personal, has always been one of her dreams. In 2008, Ava launched her handmade jewelry line called Madame Bouvier which has been featured is magazines such as Star and Latin American Vogue , and worn by celebrities such as Mya and Micah Jesse. She is very passionate about design and is always looking for new projects and clients. Please feel free to contact her with any inquiries. AvaMichele@gmail.com
